plugin.name: CustomUI
plugin.author: federico.ferri.it@gmail.com
plugin.description: API functions for creating custom user interfaces.

command.name: msgBox
command.description: Display a message box.

command.name: fileDialog
command.description: Display a file dialog.

command.name: colorDialog
command.description: Display a color dialog.

param.name: showAlphaChannel
param.description: allow the user to select the alpha component of a color

command.name: create
command.description: Create a window.

param.name: uiHandle
param.description: a handle to the created UI

command.name: destroy
command.description: Destroy a window.

command.name: setButtonText
command.description: Set the text of a button.

command.name: setButtonPressed
command.description: Set the state of a button.

command.name: getSliderValue
command.description: Get the value of a slider widget.

command.name: setSliderValue
command.description: Set the value of a slider widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getEditValue
command.description: Get the value of a edit widget.

command.name: setEditValue
command.description: Set the value of a edit widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getSpinboxValue
command.description: Get the value of a spinbox widget.

command.name: setSpinboxValue
command.description: Set the value of a spinbox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getCheckboxValue
command.description: Get the value of a checkbox widget.

command.name: setCheckboxValue
command.description: Set the value of a checkbox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getRadiobuttonValue
command.description: Get the value of a radiobutton widget.

command.name: setRadiobuttonValue
command.description: Set the value of a radiobutton widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getLabelText
command.description: Get the text of a label widget.

command.name: setLabelText
command.description: Set the text of a label widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: insertComboboxItem
command.description: Insert an item in a combobox widget.

param.name: index
param.description: If the index is equal to or higher than the total number of items, the new item is appended to the list of existing items. If the index is zero or negative, the new item is prepended to the list of existing items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: removeComboboxItem
command.description: Remove an item from a combobox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getComboboxItemCount
command.description: Get the number of items in the specified combobox widget.

command.name: getComboboxItemText
command.description: Get the text of an item in a combobox widget.

command.name: getComboboxItems
command.description: Get the content of a combobox.

command.name: setComboboxItems
command.description: Populate a combobox widget with the specified items, and set the selected item to the specified index.

param.name: index
param.description: Index of selected item after inserting all the items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getComboboxSelectedIndex
command.description: Get the selected item index in a combobox widget.

param.name: index
param.description: Index of selected item after inserting all the items.

command.name: setComboboxSelectedIndex
command.description: Change the selected item index in a combobox widget.

param.name: index
param.description: Index of selected item after inserting all the items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: hide
command.description: Hide the UI window.

command.name: show
command.description: Show the UI window.

command.name: isVisible
command.description: Check if the window is visible.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: getPosition
command.description: Get the position of a UI window.

command.name: setPosition
command.description: Set the position of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getSize
command.description: Get the size of a UI window.

command.name: setSize
command.description: Set the size of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getTitle
command.description: Get the title of a UI window.

command.name: setTitle
command.description: Set the title of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setWindowEnabled
command.description: Enable or disable a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setImageData
command.description: Set image content using specified bitmap (RGB888) data.

command.name: setEnabled
command.description: Enable or disable a widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getCurrentTab
command.description: Get the current tab index of a tabs widget.

command.name: setCurrentTab
command.description: Set the current tab index in a tabs widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setStyleSheet
command.description: Set the stylesheet of a widget.

command.name: getWidgetVisibility
command.description: Get the visibility status of a widget.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: setWidgetVisibility
command.description: Hide or show a widget.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: getCurrentEditWidget
command.description: Get the edit widget with focus and selected text.

param.name: id
param.description: widget id of an edit widget, or -1 if no edit widget was focused and had selected text.

command.name: setCurrentEditWidget
command.description: Set the edit widget focus and selected text.

param.name: id
param.description: widget id. this value can be -1, in which case the function will do nothing.

command.name: replot
command.description: Refresh all the plots of a plot widget.

item.name: time
item.description: a curve with an X-simple domain, i.e. y = f(x)

item.name: xy
item.description: a parametric curve, i.e. x = fx(t), y = fy(t)

struct.name: curve_options
struct.description: Extra options for the curve creation function .

param.name: line_style
param.description: style of the pen used to draw the line. see .

param.name: add_to_legend
param.description: if false, the curve will not be added to the legend

param.name: selectable
param.description: if false, the curve points cannot be selected and will not react to click events

param.name: track
param.description: if true, enable the mouse tracker

command.name: addCurve
command.description: Adds a curve to a plot widget.

param.name: color
param.description: color of the curve, as RGB values in the 0...255 range

param.name: options
param.description: data structure holding extra options. see .

command.name: addCurveTimePoints
command.description: Adds time points to the specified curve of the plot widget.

command.name: addCurveXYPoints
command.description: Adds points to the specified curve of the plot widget.

param.name: t
param.description: t values (i.e. the curve parameter, used also to determine how points are connected, according to natural ordering of t)

command.name: clearCurve
command.description: Clear points of the specified curve of the plot widget.

command.name: removeCurve
command.description: Remove the specified curve from the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotRanges
command.description: Set the ranges of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotXRange
command.description: Set the X range of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotYRange
command.description: Set the Y range of the plot widget.

command.name: growPlotRanges
command.description: Increase the ranges of the plot widget by a fixed amount.

command.name: growPlotXRange
command.description: Increase the X range of the plot widget.

command.name: growPlotYRange
command.description: Increase the Y range of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotLabels
command.description: Set the labels of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotXLabel
command.description: Set the X label of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotYLabel
command.description: Set the Y label of the plot widget.

command.name: rescaleAxes
command.description: Rescales the axes such that the specified curve in the plot is fully visible.

param.name: onlyEnlargeX
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

param.name: onlyEnlargeY
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

command.name: rescaleAxesAll
command.description: Rescales the axes such that all curves in the plot are fully visible.

param.name: onlyEnlargeX
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

param.name: onlyEnlargeY
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

command.name: setMouseOptions
command.description: Set plot widget options for interacting with mouse.

param.name: panX
param.description: if true, panning (by dragging with the mouse) the X axis is allowed

param.name: panY
param.description: if true, panning (by dragging with the mouse) the Y axis is allowed

param.name: zoomX
param.description: if true, zooming (by mouse wheel) the X axis is allowed

param.name: zoomY
param.description: if true, zooming (by mouse wheel) the Y axis is allowed

command.name: setLegendVisibility
command.description: Set visibility of the plot legend (default is hidden).

param.name: visible
param.description: if true, the plot legend will be visible

command.name: getCurveData
command.description: Get the data contained in the specified curve.

command.name: clearTable
command.description: Clear the specified table widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setRowCount
command.description: Resize the specified table widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setColumnCount
command.description: Resize the specified table/tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setRowHeaderText
command.description: Set the row header text of the specified table widget.

command.name: setColumnHeaderText
command.description: Set the column header text of the specified table/tree widget.

command.name: setItem
command.description: Change item value in the specified table widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setItemImage
command.description: Change item image in the specified table widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getRowCount
command.description: Get the table widget number of rows.

command.name: getColumnCount
command.description: Get the number of columns in the specified table/tree widget.

command.name: getItem
command.description: Get the table widget item text.

command.name: setItemEditable
command.description: Change item editable flag in the specified table widget.

command.name: saveState
command.description: Save header state of the specified table/tree widget.

command.name: restoreState
command.description: Restore a previously saved header state of the specified table/tree widget.

param.name: state
param.description: a previously saved string representing the state

command.name: setColumnWidth
command.description: Resize a column in the specified table/tree widget.

command.name: setRowHeight
command.description: Resize a row in the specified table widget.

command.name: setTableSelection
command.description: Set selection in a table widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setProgress
command.description: Chnge the value of a progressbar widget.

command.name: clearTree
command.description: Clear the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: addTreeItem
command.description: Add an item to the specified tree widget.

param.name: parent_id
param.description: parent item id (0 means a toplevel item)

param.name: expanded
param.description: if true, the item will be in expanded state

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: updateTreeItemText
command.description: Modify the text of an existing item in the specified tree widget.

command.name: updateTreeItemParent
command.description: Modify the parent of an existing item in the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: removeTreeItem
command.description: Remove an item from the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setTreeSelection
command.description: Set selection in a tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: expandAll
command.description: Expand all nodes in the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: collapseAll
command.description: Collapse all nodes in the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: expandToDepth
command.description: Expand nodes up to a certain depth in the specified tree widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: addNode
command.description: Add a node to a dataflow widget.

command.name: removeNode
command.description: Remove a node from a dataflow widget.

command.name: setNodeValid
command.description: Set the validity flag of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: isNodeValid
command.description: Get the validity flag of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: setNodePos
command.description: Set the position of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: getNodePos
command.description: Get the position of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: setNodeText
command.description: Set the text of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: getNodeText
command.description: Get the text of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: setNodeInletCount
command.description: Set the inlet count of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: getNodeInletCount
command.description: Get the inlet count of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: setNodeOutletCount
command.description: Set the inlet count of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: getNodeOutletCount
command.description: Get the inlet count of a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: addConnection
command.description: Remove a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: removeConnection
command.description: Remove a node in a dataflow widget.

command.name: setText
command.description: Set the text in a text-browser widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setUrl
command.description: Load an url in a text-browser widget.

command.name: addScene3DNode
command.description: Add a node in a scene3d widget.

command.name: removeScene3DNode
command.description: Remove a node in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeEnabled
command.description: Enable or disable a node in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeIntParam
command.description: Set node int parameter in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeFloatParam
command.description: Set node float parameter in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeStringParam
command.description: Set node string parameter in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeVector2Param
command.description: Set node vector2 parameter in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeVector3Param
command.description: Set node vector3 parameter in a scene3d widget.

command.name: setScene3DNodeVector4Param
command.description: Set node vector4 parameter in a scene3d widget.

script-function.name: onclickCallback
script-function.description: Callback for button click event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the clicked button

script-function.name: onLinkActivatedCallback
script-function.description: Callback for when a link is clicked.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the clicked button

param.name: link
param.description: the href attribute of the activated link

script-function.name: onchangeIntCallback
script-function.description: Callback for widget change event.

script-function.name: onchangeDoubleCallback
script-function.description: Callback for widget change event.

script-function.name: onchangeStringCallback
script-function.description: Callback for widget change event.

script-function.name: oneditingfinishedCallback
script-function.description: Callback for editing finished event.

script-function.name: oncloseCallback
script-function.description: Callback for window close event. It will be called when the user clicks the close button of the window. When an onclose callback is specified, the window will not close automatically when the user clicks the window close button.

script-function.name: onPlottableClickCallback
script-function.description: Callback for plot widget plottableClick event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

param.name: index
param.description: the index of the clicked point in the curve

param.name: x
param.description: the x value of the clicked point

param.name: y
param.description: the y value of the clicked point

script-function.name: onLegendClickCallback
script-function.description: Callback for plot widget legendClick event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

script-function.name: onCellActivateCallback
script-function.description: Callback for table widget cellActivated event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

param.name: row
param.description: the row index (zero based) of the activated cell

param.name: column
param.description: the column index (zero based) of the activated cell

script-function.name: onTableSelectionChangeCallback
script-function.description: Callback for table widget selectionChanged event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

param.name: row
param.description: the row index (zero based) of the activated cell

param.name: column
param.description: the column index (zero based) of the activated cell

script-function.name: onTreeSelectionChangeCallback
script-function.description: Callback for tree widget selectionChanged event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

script-function.name: onMouseEventCallback
script-function.description: Callback for a mouse event.

param.name: type
param.description: the mouse event type, one of the values from

script-function.name: onNodeAddedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when a node is added to a dataflow widget.

script-function.name: onNodeRemovedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when a node is removed from a dataflow widget.

script-function.name: onNodeValidChangedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when the validity of a node is changed in a dataflow widget.

script-function.name: onNodePosChangedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when the position of a node is changed in a dataflow widget.

param.name: x
param.description: the x coordinate of the node

param.name: y
param.description: the y coordinate of the node

script-function.name: onNodeTextChangedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when the text of a node is changed in a dataflow widget.

script-function.name: onNodeInletCountChangedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when the inlet count of a node is changed in a dataflow widget.

param.name: count
param.description: the inlet count of the node

script-function.name: onNodeOutletCountChangedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when the outlet count of a node is changed in a dataflow widget.

param.name: count
param.description: the outlet count of the node

script-function.name: onConnectionAddedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when a connection is created in a dataflow widget.

param.name: srcNodeId
param.description: the ID of source the node

param.name: srcOutlet
param.description: the index (zero-based) of the source node outlet

param.name: dstNodeId
param.description: the ID of the destination node

param.name: dstInlet
param.description: the index (zero-based) of the destination node inlet

script-function.name: onConnectionRemovedCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when a connection is removed in a dataflow widget.

param.name: srcNodeId
param.description: the ID of source the node

param.name: srcOutlet
param.description: the index (zero-based) of the source node outlet

param.name: dstNodeId
param.description: the ID of the destination node

param.name: dstInlet
param.description: the index (zero-based) of the destination node inlet

script-function.name: onKeyPressCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when a key is pressed in a widget.

param.name: key
param.description: the integer value of the key

param.name: text
param.description: a textual representation of the key

script-function.name: onScene3DObjectClickCallback
script-function.description: Callback called when an object is clicked in a scene3d widget.
